description: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life-force. If Charmander is weak, the flame also burns weakly.
Squirtle is a small reptilian Pokémon that resembles a light-blue turtle. It typically walks on two legs but can run on all fours. Its body is encased by a tough shell that hardens after birth.

Bulbasaur is a small, quadrupedal amphibian Pokémon with blue-green skin and darker patches. It has red eyes, pointed ear-like structures, and a short blunt snout. Each of its thick legs ends with three sharp claws.
